Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, the task has three parts: Examining task breakdown The task splits into three main parts: identifying cases, analyzing them, and suggesting improvements. First part focuses on spotting violations of normative rules and explaining why they occur. Second part involves finding cases that dont meet desired goals, noting theyre suboptimal but not critical. Third part suggests potential solutions or enhancements, though details are incomplete here.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Analyzing Case Details Case 1 follows the sequence: Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision (Approved) Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case, with no normative violations.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: All steps are in order, and approved cases allow finalization before closing, meeting all norms.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Desiderata met: Credit Check within 24 hours (30 minutes) and informing within 48 hours (2 hours), with no follow-up call required but noted as a non-strict goal.
